reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress sexy and flattering, with a flattering fit that accentuates curves in all the right places. The dress is comfortable with non-itchy material, and customers appreciate its stretchiness and form-shaping properties. The material quality receives mixed feedback - while some find it lovely, others say it feels cheap. The see-through aspect is also mixed, with some loving the see-through sleeves while others find it completely see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect black dress
items.body: Such an elegant dress for an affordable price. I loved everything about it. The way it fit down to the touch of it. It fit like a glove. I am 5’1, 130lbs and dd for reference. I got a size small. It have a good amount of stretch and gives you an amazing hourglass shape. The long sheer arm sleeves add a good touch. Read more
items.author: Diana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fitted Dress
items.body: I got this dress for my 20 yr old daughter and it is absolutely stunning! The royal blue color is bold and elegant, and the ruched design gives such a flattering, figure-hugging fit. The material feels soft with just the right amount of stretch, making it comfortable to wear while still looking chic. Perfect for a night out, a date, or even a special event. It makes her feel confident and glamorous. Read more
items.author: A. S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, stretchy, and perfect for any occasion
items.body: Here’s a polished Amazon review you can copy and paste: Title: Flattering, stretchy, and perfect for any occasion! Review: I was honestly surprised by how good this dress looks on! The material is stretchy, comfortable, and really flattering thanks to the ruching. It hugs the body in all the right places without feeling too tight. The length is perfect and the quality feels great for the price. I’ve already worn it out and got so many compliments. If you’re thinking about it—just get it! Read more
items.author: Monica

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress
items.body: I am 5'2, 120 pounds and got a size small. The dress fits perfect and is very comfortable. The material is thinner around the arms so you'd definitely need a jacket if you're wearing during the colder months. Read more
items.author: Jas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like the picture
items.body: This dress was so perfect. It was true to size. And it looked amazing. The material is great. Read more
items.author: Vanessa perez

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Unflattering style on me. Arrived in poor condition
items.body: As far as the dress itself, it was not flattering to my body type, but it might be to others. At best, It made me look like I had no waist at all, and a flat butt, As the ruching, actually added a bunch of bulk and made me look thicker, pretty much obscured my waist and the arch of my low back. At best, it made me look like I had no curves, but from some angles it actually made me look sort of like a pear shape, which I am definitely not. I'm 5'7" and 110lbs ,and ordered a size small. The bust line was too low for me, too. Fabric looked kind of cheap, was so wrinkly it was hard to even appreciate it. The zipper was firmly jammed, I didn't try to make it work. Thankfully the fabric was stretchy so I was able to slip into it despite the jammed zipper. The other issue is prob an Amazon warehouse Quality Control issue (I'm assuming it was sent from an Amazon warehouse, and not the seller, so then it wouldn't be the seller's fault), but the dress arrived wadded up in one of Amazon clear return bags with the telltale green print, dirty and smelling. It was very obvious used, with no product tags on it, was thoroughly wrinkled, and there was random tufts of animal fur accessorizing it, and what appears to be either grass or hay and other mystery dirty bits (food?) on the both the outside and inside of the dress. The zipper was jammed about 8 inches down, and I didn't try to force it, but it obviously was not working. The dress smelled strongly of either perfume or fabric softener. I imagine someone wore the dress out for an occasion, left it in a crumpled dirty heap on the floor for a while, and then decided to return it, and Amazon didn't even bother to clean it up, just passed it off to me at full price. It's too bad that some people have such low character that they would do such a thing, but it is even more disturbing to me that Amazon would charge me full price and send it out in such a condition. Even Goodwill has higher standards. The whole experience was disturbing, strong ick factor. I think I will be shopping locally for clothes for a while after having several similar experiences with Amazon in the past eight months. Read more
items.author: Kate's Got Ideas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits body like a glove
items.body: Fits beautifully and so sexy. I am a curvy petite and 5’2 and 137 lbs. I normally fit size 4P and ordered the small which fit my body perfectly. The material is lightweight and stretchy. The sleeves are sheer and were perfect for dancing and kept me comfortable throughout the night. The price was reasonable and I hit this the next day to wear for a bachelorette party. Love love love Read more
items.author: ruby medrano

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress but hard to pull off with small chest
items.body: Overall, the dress isn’t too bad but I thought it would look different in person based on the pictures. The color is a bit darker and more opaque than pictured. Quality of material isn’t too good but worth the price… and the top part is just not it. Very uncomfortable to wear if you (like me) have small boobs. It has a big space for boobs to fill and wearing a push up bra didn’t solve it for me. I did like the see through sleeves and it is pretty, but the space designated for your chest is pretty big. Read more
items.author: Vanessa

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Ruched Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Ruched Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Winered, White, Royal Blue, Black, Coffee, Dark Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
